The core engine for project $\large\hat{y}$.

The dataset is from New York City Airbnb Open Data on kaggle

DATA = Path("../data")

CSV_PATH = DATA/"AB_NYC_2019.csv"

df = pd.read_csv(CSV_PATH)
df.sample(100)
